title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: November 10, 2022, 09:07:55 PMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 07:55:35 PM by mx12.levins
content: Lot1Lot2 Lot3Lot4Lot5Lot1 - BTC BINARY BULL Sol Noctis 10th Anniversary Bitcoin 1 Oz Silver Coin 1 mBTC 2019 PP:Highest Bidder: "Anonymous" with 0.008 or 800,000 sats  SOLD Highest Bidder: YodasRedRocket with 0.006 or 600,000 sats   Sorry YodasRedRocket, sold to first bidder, won't be fair to him but I will keep you in mind for my next sell if there will be Sol Noctis coins This is my first such a unorganized sale/auction, sorry about this. Will never ever happen again. Please let as find compromise for this one. _________________________________________Lot2 - Liberty United Crypto States 1 oz Proof Silver Coin 1000 Satoshi 2022 United Crypto States, Mintage quantity: 3000 pcs_________________________________________Lot3 - In Bitcoin We Trust by MrCryptHODL - He is creating a lot of stuff which I can't afford jet, but I got somehow these beautiful ones. Who knows how valuable they will be in future, but all these things are more than just coins, it's having some kind history from all the beginning._________________________________________Lot4 - Pr1mal Cypher and CI Crypto Imperator collaboration second coin with quantity of 200 coins, first one with bitcoin should be loaded with 0.01 BTC and Limitation is set up to 100 coins(I don't have this coin anymore, I have made gift for an person) SOLD_________________________________________Lot5 - Casino chips_________________________________________Lot6 - All lot's together, I prefer to sell everything together as Lot6 - will give up/sell my small collection to the highest bidder. _________________________________________¬†¬†My Idea was to sell everything together, if anyone interested in this small coin and couple chip collection please let me know. I have tried to do my best to hodl these but that's life  Sometimes this is for good, who knows - and I appreciate a lot my collectors  They gave me a lot of support and always giving more Thanks! With regards MX12 art:) _________________________________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Lot 1 and lot 4 I would say are your best pieces in this lot. The 1HODLclub diy pieces are super nice collectibles but at the moment don‚Äôt command the same premium the sol noctis and imperator rounds do. Are you selling these or just asking about them?

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Okey, we are now at this point I must sell, my Idea was to sell everything together, even the chips, if anyone interested in this small coin and chip collection please let me know. I have tried to do my best to hodl these but that's life Smiley Sometimes this is for good, who knows - and I want to thank you all my collectors, I appreciate a lot what they do, They gave me a lot of support and always giving more Thanks! With regards MX12 art:) Without them I wasn't possible to create any art at all  They changed my life and showed me, how important is that what I do! Of course I will contact first the people who sent me messages earlier:)
